DOC: article-19927.txt.xml story | 0 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 | At least four people were wounded on Wednesday , May 16 in clashes between the army and residents of two areas of Lebanon 's city of Tripoli supporting opposite sides in the crisis in neighbouring Syria , a security official said , according to AFP . at least four people be wound on Wednesday , May 16 in clash between the army and resident of two area of Lebanon 's city of Tripoli support opposite side in the crisis in neighbouring Syria , a security official say , accord to AFP .
